  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    def.threejs.three.BinaryTextureLoader
    since 0.84.0. Use DataTextureLoader (renamed)
    def.threejs.three.BoundingBoxHelper
    Use THREE.BoxHelper instead.
    def.threejs.three.CubeGeometry
    Use BoxGeometry instead.
    def.threejs.three.DynamicBufferAttribute
    Use THREE.BufferAttribute().setDynamic( true ) instead.
    def.threejs.three.EdgesHelper
    Use THREE.EdgesGeometry
    def.threejs.three.Face4
    Use Face3 instead.
    def.threejs.three.Float32Attribute
    THREE.Float32Attribute has been removed. Use new THREE.Float32BufferAttribute() instead.
    def.threejs.three.Float64Attribute
    THREE.Float64Attribute has been removed. Use new THREE.Float64BufferAttribute() instead.
    def.threejs.three.Int16Attribute
    THREE.Int16Attribute has been removed. Use new THREE.Int16BufferAttribute() instead.
    def.threejs.three.Int32Attribute
    THREE.Int32Attribute has been removed. Use new THREE.Int32BufferAttribute() instead.
    def.threejs.three.Int8Attribute
    THREE.Int8Attribute has been removed. Use new THREE.Int8BufferAttribute() instead.
    def.threejs.three.MeshFaceMaterial
    Use MultiMaterial instead.
    def.threejs.three.MultiMaterial
    Use an Array instead.
    def.threejs.three.Particle
    Use Sprite instead.
    def.threejs.three.ParticleBasicMaterial
    Use THREE.PointsMaterial instead
    def.threejs.three.ParticleSystem
    Use THREE.Points instead.
    def.threejs.three.ParticleSystemMaterial
    Use THREE.PointsMaterial instead
    def.threejs.three.PointCloud
    Use THREE.Points instead.
    def.threejs.three.PointCloudMaterial
    Use THREE.PointsMaterial instead
    def.threejs.three.Uint16Attribute
    THREE.Uint16Attribute has been removed. Use new THREE.Uint16BufferAttribute() instead.
    def.threejs.three.Uint32Attribute
    THREE.Uint32Attribute has been removed. Use new THREE.Uint32BufferAttribute() instead.
    def.threejs.three.Uint8Attribute
    THREE.Uint8Attribute has been removed. Use new THREE.Uint8BufferAttribute() instead.
    def.threejs.three.Uint8ClampedAttribute
    THREE.Uint8ClampedAttribute has been removed. Use new THREE.Uint8ClampedBufferAttribute() instead.
    def.threejs.three.Vertex
    use THREE.Vector3 instead.
    def.threejs.three.WireframeHelper
    Use THREE.WireframeGeometry instead.
